enhanced_by.reason: The offer method operates on a synchronized queue, which is initialized by the synchronizedQueue method.
The offer method accesses the decorated queue, which is returned by the decorated method.
The poll method retrieves and removes the head of the queue, which can be used to verify the state of the queue after an offer operation.
The peek method retrieves but does not remove the head of the queue, which can be used to verify the state of the queue after an offer operation without altering it.
